text: Cácio de Souza Costa (born 11 February 1995), also known as Cácio Souza, is a Brazilian born East Timorese football player. ==International career== Cácio made his senior international debut against Brunei national football team in the 2014 AFF Championship qualification on 12 October 2014.http://www.national-football- teams.com/matches/report/11489/East_Timor_Brunei.html ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:East Timorese footballers Category:Timor-Leste international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:East Timorese expatriate footballers Category:Brazilian emigrants to East Timor
title: Cácio de Souza Costa
